title: The Courier
additional-note: This is an international publication with multiple editions. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. The one contribution renewal record mentioning this publication says that the May 1957 US edition issue in which the contribution appeared was published in the US in November 1957.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
